actions.in_committee: House Committee on Banking and Financial Services
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Financial Institutions and Consumer Credit.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Financial Institutions and Consumer Credit

official_title: To amend the Federal Deposit Insurance Act and the Federal Credit Union Act to prohibit fees for using teller windows at depository institutions, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Depository Institution Customer Protection Act - Amends the Federal Deposit Insurance Act and the Federal Credit Union Act to prohibit the imposition of any fee on an institution's customer for using its teller windows at a domestic branch.

titles.title: To amend the Federal Deposit Insurance Act and the Federal Credit Union Act to prohibit fees for using teller windows at depository institutions, and for other purposes.
